alert.note: Alert for Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 5:47PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Vermont, including the following county, Chittenden. * WHEN...Until 945 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 546 PM EST, Local law enforcement reported flooding along the Browns River in Essex, with Route 128 down to one lane due to high water. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Essex and Westford. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
